Fucking shitiest game on this planet, with their shitty ban system. That moment when u get banned for a week, come back to play a game and then kick a retard out of ur team cause he's playing so shit, guess what happens after you leave the game? you get banned again, that is because 'u kicked too many players' fuck this retarded ass game, i would suggest never downloading this piece of garbage that I should've never even spent my money on, fking retarded ass shitty game

God Game  But so match cheater))

Esto es para la gente que se lo va a descargar gratuitamente. les recomiendo que compren el juego, me hice una segunda cuenta y en esta jugue 5 partidas competitivas, de las cuales las 5 estaban con personas usando hacks, tanto peonza, wall, aim o bunny, si queres jugar con tus amigos comprate el juego no vale la pena jugar sin prime, esto hablo por los servidores de latino america, no se como estan los hacks en otros servidores pero en el servidor que juego solo me emparejaron con hackers.

good game but sometimes you get very toxic and angry kids

The game is fun but is quite a grind which i think is a good thing, Getting skins feels awesome rather than useless like it would in another game like COD, the gameplay is very realistic but very difficult and sometimes doesn't make sense like when it tells you that you hit someone once yet with your own eyes you saw him get hit 4 times, the games report button does nothing so if you need to report an obvious hacker that admits to hacking message steam support, but other than those 2 issues the game is fun much more realistic and much more rewarding

:)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
